name: Grumpfish
description:
A prototype (didn't get as far as I'd hoped) made for #NotThe48. Only one level and you can't die. 

Controls: arrow keys or gamepad left stick to move. That's it!

Move to collect bubbles, stop to shoot all bubbles you've collected. The rest (hopefully) is self explanatory.

Credits

Audio - Zander Hulme

Everything else - Kieran Lord (Cratesmith)
